title: BRIEF-MLS, Largan Bright to invest 200 mln yuan in Kaifa's LED lighting unit
text:
BRIEF-MLS, Largan Bright to invest 200 mln yuan in Kaifa's LED lighting unit Sept 10 
Sept 10 Shenzhen Kaifa Technology Co Ltd 
* Says MLS and Largan Bright plan to invest 200 million yuan ($31.40 million) in its LED lighting unit for 12.1 percent stake 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1EPIcQ5 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3700 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
